summary:
Rockinghorses - modders resource.
More toys for the children of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

Rockinghorses
=============

Modder's resource and Demo esp

Author: Tamira
Original model of the rockinghorse: Walery Nowak (http://archive3d.net/?a=download&id=d6687cc7)


Description:
============

This is a modder's resource. You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit to the author including the creator of the original model and you do not charge money for it.

For those who are not familiar with the Creation Kit I offer an optional download with a demo esp and additional meshes for take-away rockinghorses.
I added two furniture rockinghorses to the porch in front of the Sleeping Giant in Riverwood where they are often used by children and I added four clutter rockinghorses behind the inn that you can add to your inventory and place whereever you want. You can not sit on those of course, they are only for decoration purposes.

Version 1.3: Having more experience with Skyrim collision meanwhile I added better fitting collision to the all of the rockinghorses.

===============
Installation:
===============

Extract the contents into your Data folder:

Rockinghorses.esp

meshes/furniture/rockinghorse
meshes/clutter/rockinghorse

textures/furniture/rockinghorse

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

Delete the Rockinghorses.esp

Delete the folders:

meshes/furniture/rockinghorse
meshes/clutter/rockinghorse

textures/furniture/rockinghorse


Tools used:
===========

Nifskope
NifUtils
Gimp
Blender (for exporting the 3ds file as obj)
Creation Kit


Credits:
========

Walery Nowak from archive3d.net for the Original model of the rockinghorse
Skyfox for his great tool NifUtilsSuite
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit

===========================

Do not upload to other sites
author: Tamira
